bug.author: vrodr188
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h1>Summary</denchmark-h>
Application crashes: KeyError: (0.0, -4.0, 'âˆ’4', 'black', 'center_baseline', 'right', 5672785747490338735, None, None, 200, <weakref at 0x7f5458fed138; dead>, 1.2) <denchmark-h:h1>Steps to reproduce</denchmark-h>
Tried different browsers and same result
<denchmark-h:h1>Traceback</denchmark-h>
File "/app/.heroku/python/lib/python3.6/site-packages/streamlit/ScriptRunner.py", line 322, in _run_script exec(code, module.dict) File "/app/app.py", line 42, in fig = plot.plot_figure(style_label=style, n_columns=n_columns) File "/app/plot.py", line 132, in plot_figure fig.tight_layout() File "/app/.heroku/python/lib/python3.6/site-packages/matplotlib/cbook/deprecation.py", line 358, in wrapper return func(*args, **kwargs) File "/app/.heroku/python/lib/python3.6/site-packages/matplotlib/figure.py", line 2496, in tight_layout pad=pad, h_pad=h_pad, w_pad=w_pad, rect=rect) File "/app/.heroku/python/lib/python3.6/site-packages/matplotlib/tight_layout.py", line 360, in get_tight_layout_figure pad=pad, h_pad=h_pad, w_pad=w_pad) File "/app/.heroku/python/lib/python3.6/site-packages/matplotlib/tight_layout.py", line 109, in auto_adjust_subplotpars tight_bbox_raw = union([ax.get_tightbbox(renderer) for ax in subplots File "/app/.heroku/python/lib/python3.6/site-packages/matplotlib/tight_layout.py", line 110, in if ax.get_visible()]) File "/app/.heroku/python/lib/python3.6/site-packages/matplotlib/axes/_base.py", line 4323, in get_tightbbox bb_xaxis = self.xaxis.get_tightbbox(renderer) File "/app/.heroku/python/lib/python3.6/site-packages/matplotlib/axis.py", line 1188, in get_tightbbox self._update_label_position(renderer) File "/app/.heroku/python/lib/python3.6/site-packages/matplotlib/axis.py", line 2021, in _update_label_position bboxes, bboxes2 = self._get_tick_boxes_siblings(renderer=renderer) File "/app/.heroku/python/lib/python3.6/site-packages/matplotlib/axis.py", line 2006, in _get_tick_boxes_siblings tlb, tlb2 = axx.xaxis._get_tick_bboxes(ticks_to_draw, renderer) File "/app/.heroku/python/lib/python3.6/site-packages/matplotlib/axis.py", line 1174, in _get_tick_bboxes for tick in ticks if tick.label1.get_visible()], File "/app/.heroku/python/lib/python3.6/site-packages/matplotlib/axis.py", line 1174, in for tick in ticks if tick.label1.get_visible()], File "/app/.heroku/python/lib/python3.6/site-packages/matplotlib/text.py", line 905, in get_window_extent bbox, info, descent = self._get_layout(self._renderer) File "/app/.heroku/python/lib/python3.6/site-packages/matplotlib/text.py", line 426, in _get_layout self._cached[key] = ret File "/app/.heroku/python/lib/python3.6/site-packages/matplotlib/cbook/init.py", line 560, in setitem del self[self._killkeys[0]]

comments.comment:
It appears this issue is in regards to this app: <denchmark-link:https://matplotlib-style-configurator.herokuapp.com/>https://matplotlib-style-configurator.herokuapp.com/</denchmark-link>
If so, we're not the creators of this app, so the user themselves will need to maintain their infrastructure. I'm closing this issue for now, but if I'm mistaken, please comment and I will re-open the ticket.
